attributes.action: ensure that the legendary Sean Trenoweth receives a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sean Trenoweth is a young man of 17 who hails from London, he has done much good work for the country (mainly for himself) but it is about time this great man is honoured in the way that he deserves, being knighted would be the ultimate and fitting accolade for him.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
